description: Compare VEO3 Fast vs Standard models for video generation quality and cost

metadata.author: SmokeDev
metadata.purpose: Determine if VEO3 Standard's higher cost justifies quality improvement
metadata.hypothesis: VEO3 Fast provides sufficient quality for most use cases at 1/7th the cost
